poem_en:
Whispered words wasted, washed ashore.
Vulnerable verses veil vulnerabilities.
Memories melt, moments muddled.
Constantly connecting, consonant chords.
Digital divergence, distant desires.
Linguistic labyrinths, letters linger.
Missing, mourning, mutual misunderstandings.
poem_it:
Silenziose parole sprecate, spinte sulla spiaggia
Versi vulnerabili velano vulnerabilit√†
Memorie mute, momenti mescolati
Costanti connessioni, consonanti corde
Divergenze digitali, desideri distanti
Labirinti linguistici, lettere lente
Mancanze, malinconie, malintesi mutui
